snippet: Some say three bank robbers made a great escape from prison in the San Francisco Bay in 1962, while others say they could not have survived.
abstract: Fate of three inmates who escaped from the federal prison on Alcatraz Island in San Francisco Bay in 1962 remains a mystery; bodies of Frank Lee Morris and brothers Clarence and John Anglin were never found; some aficionados of unsolved mysteries say they successfully escaped and may still be alive, while others say they drowned in the bay.
lead_paragraph: Some say three bank robbers made a great escape from prison in the San Francisco Bay in 1962, while others say they could not have survived.

headline.seo: Anniversary of a Mystery at Alcatraz
headline.main: Tale of 3 Inmates Who Vanished From Alcatraz Maintains Intrigue 50 Years Later
headline.print_headline: Fate of 3 Inmates Who Vanished From Alcatraz Remains a Mystery 50 Years Later
